FAQ / Wave 5 / Characters /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Tidal Wave - Dark Fleet

  1. If your opponent KOs one of your characters, other than the Battleship, and you play an I Still Function! to bring that character back, does Tidal Wave combine at the end of turn? (Source: Community)
    Yes, Tidal Wave does combine. WotC (Drew) confirmed this in a comment to this community poll.
